weaknessDescription: Multi-factor authentication is not currently enforced for all remote access connections to the internal network, including VPN and administrative portals.
The current encryption module used for data-at-rest protection on mobile devices is not FIPS 140-2 validated as required by CMMC Level 2.

weaknessName: Inadequate Audit Logging on Critical Systems
weaknessDescription: Several legacy application servers are not currently capturing successful/failed login attempts and administrative privilege elevation events.
Generic 'Administrator' and 'Root' accounts are still being used for shared system administration tasks instead of uniquely identifiable user accounts.
Visitor logs for the primary server room are being maintained on paper and at times contain illegible signatures or missing 'Out' times.
